item.title: U.S. and India to double bilateral trade in five years, Prime Minister Modi says, as Trump tariffs loom
item.description: Trump said he would begin talks with India on disparities on trade and hoped to reach an agreement.

item.title: Trump denies meddling in Eric Adams case as 6 top prosecutors quit over DOJ dismissal order
item.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams was indicted last fall on bribery, fraud and other charges in Manhattan federal court.

item.title: U.S. embassies told to prepare for staff cuts as Trump overhauls diplomatic corps, Reuters reports
item.description: Trump's administration has asked U.S. embassies worldwide to prepare for staff cuts as part of efforts to overhaul the U.S. diplomatic corps.

item.title: Trump signs sweeping reciprocal tariff plan, says more coming
item.description: Trump's all-caps post on Truth Social announcing the presser offered no details about the plan for new tariffs.

item.title: Elon Musk's X to pay about $10 million to settle Trump lawsuit over account suspension
item.description: Facebook and Instagram owner Meta recently said it would pay $25 million to settle a similar lawsuit by President Donald Trump.
